import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useRouter } from "next/router"; import { toast } from "react-toastify"; import { Spinner } from "reactstrap"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { Alert } from "reactstrap"; import ChatClient from "../../../stanza/chatClient"; import { setUser } from "../../../redux/actions/index"; const URL = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_REACT_APP_WEBSOCKET_ENDPOINT; const DOMAIN = process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_REACT_APP_DEFAULT_DOMAIN; const Auth_SignIn = (props) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const router = useRouter(); let errorArray = []; let error; let chatClient = new ChatClient(onAuthFailed, onAuthSuccess); const [credential, setCredential] = useState({ email: "", password: "", errors: [], loading: false, }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setCredential({ ...credential, [name]: value }); }; // simple login const userLogin = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); if (isFormValid()) { setCredential({ ...credential, errors: [], loading: true }); onLogin(credential.email, credential.password); } else { console.log("not valid"); } }; const onLogin = (email, password) => { chatClient.create(email, password); chatClient.connect(); }; const onAuthFailed = (event) => { console.log("authentication failed"); }; const onAuthSuccess = () => { console.log("authentication success"); }; const isFormValid = () => { if (isFormEmpty(credential.email, credential.password)) { error = { message: "Please Fill all the Fields" }; setCredential({ ...credential, errors: errorArray.concat(error) }); return false; } else { return true; } }; const isFormEmpty = (email, password) => { return !email.length && !password.length; }; const displayErrors = () => credential.errors.map((error, i) => ( {error.message} )); const redirectToSignUpPage = () => { console.log("signup"); router.push("/auth/signUp"); }; return (

Hello Everyone , We are Chitchat

Welcome to chitchat please login to your account.

{credential.errors.length > 0 && displayErrors()}
handleChange(e)} name="email" value={credential.email} type="email" placeholder="Demo@123gmail.com" />
handleChange(e)} name="password" type="password" value={credential.password} placeholder="*******" />
Forgot Password?
OR Connect with

*Terms and condition&Privacy policy

); }; export default Auth_SignIn;
